::Kluster::

Kluster nods. "Every bot has his beliefs. But if you plan to be a 
Maximal on this planet, you're under command of Iron Raptor, and her 
orders are to cease fire. This isn't a surrender, its a ceasefire."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Tarantopulous: I understand what you are saying, but I live in a 
code of
> honor. My parents didn't have it, but I do. I will fight to the 
death if I
> must, but I will never surrender. I think only of my fellow 
Maximals when I
> say that I will never give in...
